import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { setAuthedUser } from '../actions/authedUser' class Nav extends Component { logOut = () => { const { dispatch } = this.props dispatch(setAuthedUser('')) window.location.href="/" } render() { const { username } = this.props console.log('username : ',username); return (
  • Home
  • LeaderBoard
  • New Question
  • { username !== '' ? : null}
  • Log Out
) } } function mapStateToProps({users,authedUser}) { console.log(users) console.log('a',authedUser) return { username: authedUser && users ? users[authedUser].name : '' } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Nav)
